title: Help w/ game freezing
body: So recently whenever I have been loading into league my computer completely crashes and it makes this awful buzzing sound. So far it has only happened when I am playing League and I has only started a few days ago. Can anyone help?

replies.body: The freeze and buzzing sounds may be caused by the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which was auto-enabled in a Windows 10 update.  Disabling it should get this fixed!
Guess I'll just wait and check back on next patch update see if you guys fixed it.
Tried uninstalling and reinstalling, same issues still, Xbox gamebar is turned off.  Will continue to self troubleshoot but it'd be great to get some actual help, otherwise the game is unplayable.
Any other ideas or options available?  Or anything I can do to help get the issue figured out from my end?

I disabled it and tried a new game, but it still crashed.  Unlike previously however I was able to log in again and finish the game without it crashing a second time.  I'll keep messing with the settings, but its entirely possible the issue lies elsewhere.

EDIT: Attempted both solutions and the issue still persists.

Thanks for the assistance in the matter

I get the same issue, screen gets stuck in a random color, usually red or green, and makes this horrible buzzing sound.  Didn't have any issues til this last round of patches, and even with the graphics on very low (previously played them on very high with ~100 FPS) it still happens.  Heard of similar issues with other players in game but haven't found a solution myself, or seen one in game or on forums.
